danish_publication: Oves kone i Randum ved Lögstør var skrap til at hekse. Hun havde en handskefinger hængende over sin seng, og når hun trak i den, fik hun sin spand fuld af mælk, men hun sagde samtidig som så: "Nu malker a Per Nielsens ko", og mælken gik så fra koen til hende.
english_publication: Ove's wife in Randum near Løgstør was good at doing witchcraft. She had the finger of a glove hanging over her bed, and when she pulled on it, she got her bucket filled with milk, but she said at the same time, "Now I'm milking Per Nielsen's cow," and the milk then went from the cow to her.
